text: Kazhete, "Roz·hlyadayete idoliv vy vstanovyly bilya BOHA. Pokazhitʹ meni shcho na zemli zrobyly vony stvoryuyutʹ. Vony volodiyutʹ chastynoyu neba? Pokazhitʹ meni budʹ-yake inshe svyate pysannya pered tsym, abo budʹ-yakyy shmatok vstanovlenoho znannya shcho pidtrymuye vash idolatry, yakshcho vy ye pravdyvi
